name: Steve
description: $STEVE is a community-driven memecoin on Solana, fueling the development of Soulsearch, a groundbreaking game built on the Portals platform. Founder has years of expertise in Portals and a good reputation. $STEVE has enabled the hiring of a senior developer and a 3D designer to accelerate progress on the game. Backed by daily tweets, viral songs, memes, custom art, and even plushies, $STEVE thrives through endless collaborations with other crypto communities, fostering fun and engagement. Join the adventure and help shape the future of gaming on Solana. Stay shiny.
